caption: Love eating here! And Bev is the bomb.com Yes, I said it. Thanks for all the jalapenos!

Bev and Mike the masterminds behind my favorite hot sauce made in Hawaii  - Chili in Hawaii Hot Sauce is one of the best!  I live in Oregon and have been savoring the last few drops not knowing how easy it was to reach out to them and order some up.  I placed my order and with in a few days I am fully restocked with this incredible sauce.  My order came wrapped nice and secure in bubble wrap.  I am very happy with their wonderful customer service and highly recommend that if you enjoy a flavorful hot sauce order some up!  Thank you so much!
